summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 2.0°C), feels like temperature (down 2.0°C), and inside temperature (down 1.6°C).

The past week and month had observable variation in the amount of wind (up 21 miles), cloud levels (down 185 m), and light levels (down 6244 lux) when compared to today.

Yesterday’s cloud levels showed a low of 425m and a peak of 1526m, averaging 1052.2m; the week and month recorded warmer averages.

summary.summary: Inside; temperatures should be quite comfortable. Outside; like a nice, warm day. Also, pleasant humidity levels and slight breezes. Chance of light rain, cloud cover will be variable, overcast at times, and strong and powerful sunlight. No significant shifts in the weather are expected.
